mapper.select:
select bi.id, bi.code, bi.name, bi.author_id, bi.update_date, bi.last_chapter, bi.tag, bi.content, bi.images, bi.`type`, bi.create_date, bi.status, ai.name as authorName, ai.images as authorImages from book_info bi left join author_info ai on (ai.id = bi.author_id) where 1 = 1
AND bi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bookInfo.name},'%')
AND bi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bookInfo.code},'%')
AND ai.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bookInfo.authorName},'%')
order by bi.create_date desc
